Headline: Temporary #29 State Reroute at State/Roosevelt
ShortDescription: 29 State buses are temporarily rerouted near State/Roosevelt.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#29 State buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via State, Polk, Clark, Roosevelt, State, and resume  regular route, due to street blockage near State/Roosevelt.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Temporary #62 Archer Reroute at State/Roosevelt
ShortDescription: 62 Archer buses are temporarily rerouted near State/Roosevelt

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#62 Archer buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via State, Polk, Clark, Roosevelt, State, and resume regular route, due to street blockage near State/Roosevelt.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line trains bypassing Roosevelt Station
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are running, but not stopping at Roosevelt due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running, but not stopping at Roosevelt due to police activity.

As a result of the delay, shuttle buses are requested to provide connecting service from Fullerton to State/Lake in both directions.

Also, please consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include:

#3 King Drive

#4 Cottage Grove

#29 State

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.

Headline: Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running with significant delays following an earlier obstruction at Cicero/Congress. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running with significant delays following an earlier obstruction at Cicero/Congress.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Shuttle buses will continue to provide connecting service from Pulaski/Congress to Forest Park in both directions and will conclude 05:00 a.m.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th/Dan Ryan-bound Subway Trains Rerouted to Elevated Tracks
ShortDescription: 95th/Dan Ryan-bound Red Line subway trains are rerouted to the elevated lines between Fullerton and Cermak-Chinatown due to police activity at Roosevelt.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th/Dan Ryan-bound Red Line subway trains are rerouted to the elevated lines between Fullerton and Cermak-Chinatown due to police activity at Roosevelt.

Red Line service to 95th/Dan Ryan

After stopping at Fullerton, 95th-bound trains will be diverted and will make the following elevated station stops:

  • Armitage (accessible)
  • Sedgwick (accessible)
  • Chicago (at Franklin; accessible)
  • Merchandise Mart (accessible)
  • Clark/lake (accessible)
  • State/Lake
  • Washington/Wabash (accessible)
  • Adams/Wabash
  • Roosevelt (elevated station west of Wabash; accessible)

Then, trains will stop at Cermak-Chinatown and make all normal stops to 95th/Dan Ryan.

Connections can be made between Howard-bound subway service and 95th-bound rerouted service via elevated lines at Fullerton (accessible), State/Lake (board at nearby elevated station on Orange Line side for 95th-bound Red Line service) and at Roosevelt (accessible).

Shuttle buses are available between Fullerton and State/Lake to provide connecting service in both directions.

We apologize for the inconvenience and are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
